name: Dress Up Games: Model Makeover
description:
Do you have what it takes to be fashion stylist? Are you ready to step into the fashion games world, and become a super makeup stylist? If you like makeover games with styling, dress up and make up features, then this fashion designer games is for you. 

 In dress up games participate in a beauty pageant to impress judges with your fashion model look. Put together different looks to create a glamorous fashion style in indian fashion stylist. Enhance your dressing sense with a diverse collection of outfits in dress up games. Discover amazing fresh dresses and various dress up fashion items in girl games. Style different looks for different themes in fashion games for girls. Covet style fashion will test your designer skills with tons of dress up studio items. 

 • Models are waiting for you to style them in your favorite clothing
 • Style perfect look in fashion competition games 
• Do makeover and dress to win in these make up games 
• Fashion show games with exciting levels 
• Shop various super makeup stylist girl games items from the store 
• Makeover with all the accessories, makeup, and latest outfits 
• Win new fashion games items by competing with other models 

 Compete one on one with other models in makeover games. Judges will rate your look in games for girls. Dressup according to the given girl games theme. Style your model in the best way possible for dress up competition in this makeover game. Express yourself as a fashion designer in makeup games. Be creative and give your model a unique look with gorgeous dresses, shoes, and other accessories from the store. In makeover for girl’s game, make different makeover fashion style looks with your dressing ideas.

 Make up games have different dressup themes (casual, party, beach, wedding) and many more for each level. Your model needs to be perfect for every challenge of saloon games. You get to compete with Indian fashion stylist, to dress up your model with similar requirements. Improve your style fashion guru sense by competing against other models in this dress up game. Earn points to win the fashion battle and open new exciting levels. Unlock all fashion design items by playing this dress up game for girls more. 

 Be a fashion star and perform better in a fashion show at each level to get a win. Step up your dress up styles with super stylish outfits, make a perfect look for every dress up competition. Win fashion competitions to get rewards in this make up game. Experience its interactive gameplay by expressing your sense of style through this fashion game. Enjoy the glamorous world of fashion with its high-quality graphics and addictive gameplay, unlike other girls games. Check-in daily to collect your daily reward in makeup games.
